purpleculture_pinyin:
jiù
old; opposite: new 新 ; former; worn (with age)
Старый; напротив: новый 新; бывший; изношенный (с возрастом)
rtega_mnemonic:
舊舊RS
旧旧		old, ancient, former, past
  • wise person like an owl 雈 in old age using his mortar 臼 preparing ancient recipes for medecine
  • ⓢ modf. 臼 → 旧
  • if you see the sun 日 to the right and the ground 丨 to the left you've been lying dead since ancient times
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 旧)
Antonyms: 新
Pictophonetic: 臼 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.

heisig_chinese_memo: An old style flower bed and turkey coop made from brick and mortar. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese: jiù: (прил/сущ) старый, подержанный; прошлый; бывший; былое, старое; старая дружба
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the mortar (臼) in the reeds (萑) is the former one
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Looks like the number 18 which in many countries is the measure of adulthood, i.e. olden times.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (舊, 旧, jiu, past) shows an owl on the top and its claws . It used to mean birds like owls, but now it came to mean “old” or “worn.” Owls do not hunt during the day like other birds. Owls are nocturnal. So during the day an owl usually sits still.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " Huan " from " Kan " or " mouth ", " Kan " is the ancient " mortar " word, as " old " sound character. "雈" is like an owl, so the original meaning of " old " is owl. Borrowed to mean the " old " of the new and the old , so the sound of " mortar " or " mouth " is added to distinguish it. Ancient text plus " mouth " or not is a word originally, and later with the addition of " mouth " of the word represent one of the special significance.

The oracle bone inscriptions are used as place names, as well as the " old " of the new and the old . "Compilation" 32536: "Used for the past." "Old" means "Old Li", which means old wine. "Collection" 30677: "Use the old volume." "Old volume" refers to the old short volume.

The inscriptions also express the " old " of the new and the old , and the Xijia plate: "Huaishi (Yi) old we silk pan people" means that Huai Yi used to pay tribute to me. "poetry. Daya. "Wang Wen": "Although Zhou is old, its fate is restored." It also means long and long time. Chu Gonghua Zhong: "The original device is old, and the public provocation (沬) longevity." This sentence is to pray for a long-lasting good fortune. The language means that the vessel can last for a long time. "Little Erya. "Guanggu": "Old, for a long time." It also means old friends, old people, ancestors, and uncle clock: "The corpse code is old, and its ancestor." " Dian " means Shu Dian (Ma Chengyuan), it means uncle Remember his ancestors.

The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period, "Guodian Chu Slips. Jian 36-37 of Lao Zi Jia: "Long old", the forty-four chapters of Lao Zi and Mawangdui Han Silk Book. "Lao Zi Jiaben" is written as "It can last long." "Guodian Chu Jian. "Laozi Second" Jane 3: "Longevity and Old (Long) Seeing the Way." "Guodian Chujian. "Yu Cong Si" Simplified 1: "Speak to Si (word), 寈 (love) to old (for a long time)".

"Said Wen": "Old, old, old, old stay. From 雈, mortar sound. Owl, old or from bird, rest sound." "Old" is also called "鸱鸮", "鸱枭", "鸱"Owl" refers to an owl.
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from " Huan " from " Kan " or " mouth ", " Kan " is the ancient " mortar " word, as " old " sound character. "雈" is like an owl, so the original meaning of " old " is owl. Borrowed to mean the " old " of the new and the old , so the sound of " mortar " or " mouth " is added to distinguish it.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「雈」從「凵」或「口」，「凵」是古「臼」字，作為「舊」的聲符。「雈」象貓頭鷹，故「舊」的本義是貓頭鷹。借來表示新舊的「舊」，故加「臼」聲或「口」以作區別。古文字加「口」與否本來是一字，後來才用加「口」的字專門表示其中一種意義。

　　甲骨文用作地名，又用作新舊的「舊」，《合集》32536：「叀舊豊用。」「舊豊」即「舊醴」，表示陳酒。《合集》30677：「叀舊冊用。」「舊冊」指舊的簡冊。

　　金文也表示新舊的「舊」，兮甲盤：「淮尸(夷)舊我帛畮人」，指淮夷過去是向我進貢布帛的人。《詩．大雅．文王》：「周雖舊邦，其命維新。」又表示長久、久遠，邾公華鐘：「元器其舊，哉(載)公釁(沬)壽」，此句是祈求長久的吉語，表示器皿可以長久，邾公終壽。《小爾雅．廣詁》：「舊，久也。」又表示故交、舊人、先人，叔尸鐘：「尸典其先舊，及其高祖。」「典」表示數典(馬承源)，是說叔尸追念他的先祖。

　　戰國竹簡表示長久，《郭店楚簡．老子甲》簡36-37：「可以長舊」，傳世本《老子》四十四章和《馬王堆漢帛書．老子甲本》作「可以長久」。《郭店楚簡．老子乙》簡3：「長生舊(久)視之道也。」《郭店楚簡．語叢四》簡1：「言以司(詞)，寈(情)以舊(久)」。

　　《說文》：「舊，𨾦舊，舊畱也。从雈，臼聲。鵂，舊或从鳥，休聲。」「𨾦舊」又作「鴟鴞」、「鴟梟」、「鴟鵂」，指貓頭鷹。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「雈」從「凵」或「口」，「凵」是古「臼」字，作為「舊」的聲符。「雈」象貓頭鷹，故「舊」的本義是貓頭鷹。借來表示新舊的「舊」，故加「臼」聲或「口」以作區別。

  • ⿱ Above to below

①過時的，與“新”相對：舊式。舊俗。
②東西因經過長時間而變了樣子：舊衣服。舊書。
③原先曾有過的，過去很長時間的：舊居。舊友。
④有交情，有交情的人：故舊(指老朋友)。念舊(懷念舊日情誼)。
⑤陳新。
(Simplified: 旧)

甲骨文從「 雈 」從「 凵 」或「 口 」，「 凵 」是古「 臼 」字，作為「 舊 」的聲符。「 雈 」象貓頭鷹，故「 舊 」的本義是貓頭鷹。借來表示新舊的「 舊 」，故加「 臼 」聲或「 口 」以作區別。古文字加「 口 」與否本來是一字，後來才用加「 口 」的字專門表示其中一種意義。 甲骨文用作地名，又用作新舊的「 舊 」，《合集》32536：「叀舊豊用。」「舊豊」即「舊醴」，表示陳酒。《合集》30677：「叀舊冊用。」「舊冊」指舊的簡冊。 金文也表示新舊的「 舊 」，兮甲盤：「淮尸(夷)舊我帛畮人」，指淮夷過去是向我進貢布帛的人。《詩．大雅．文王》：「周雖舊邦，其命維新。」又表示長久、久遠，邾公華鐘：「元器其舊，哉(載)公釁(沬)壽」，此句是祈求長久的吉語，表示器皿可以長久，邾公終壽。《小爾雅．廣詁》：「舊，久也。」又表示故交、舊人、先人，叔尸鐘：「尸典其先舊，及其高祖。」「 典 」表示數典(馬承源)，是說叔尸追念他的先祖。 戰國竹簡表示長久，《郭店楚簡．老子甲》簡36-37：「可以長舊」，傳世本《老子》四十四章和《馬王堆漢帛書．老子甲本》作「可以長久」。《郭店楚簡．老子乙》簡3：「長生舊(久)視之道也。」《郭店楚簡．語叢四》簡1：「言以司(詞)，寈(情)以舊(久)」。 《說文》：「舊，𨾦舊，舊畱也。从雈，臼聲。鵂，舊或从鳥，休聲。」「𨾦舊」又作「鴟鴞」、「鴟梟」、「鴟鵂」，指貓頭鷹。
